data_1.title: Test 1: Fingerprint-JS
data_1.information: This test includes the utilisation of an enterprise solution to test your device. The solution is open-source and enables a browser's device to be taken, and the enterprise solution has not been allowed here because it requires an external API service.

data_2.title: Test 2: Canvas Graphic
data_2.information: This test includes utilising a public solution to check for your device's information and builds a fingerprint of this data. It also produces a second fingerprint off pre-set information, which includes loading text in a hidden (<canvas>) and evaluating specific information points about how the devices load it.

data_3.title: Test 3: WebGL
data_3.information: The final test is the most simple. It utilises and checks for the GPU of the device, and most browsers do not give up this information efficiently. The data is then sent to a file to hash its output into a number (maximum of 18 digits).
